title: Black Skies Riviera
description: She’s a debt no sinner can pay… They call this place the Billionaires’ Playground. I, Aiden Knight, staked my claim the minute I arrived. My casino is the hottest church in town, And vice is the only confession required. Issa Dubova is the queen of cloudy diamonds: An innocent. A Bratva princess. And my new wife… She’s nothing more than revenge to me: A pretty bargain for the names of the men who killed my father. I never asked to see the shape of her heart. I never asked for her to fill the blank, dark spaces of mine… “Black Skies Riviera” is an enemies-to-lovers mafia romance with NO cliff-hanger and a guaranteed HEA.
author: Catherine Wiltcher
